posts.post_content:
For sale - 1912-1916 empty Victory tobacco pouch related to the T214 Victory backs. Tough to find, and although this label has some rips/tears and a bit missing, but as people know, the labels are normally trashed so this is one of the nicer ones. 

Will ship flat, but these looks great with some cotton balls inside. 

$43.50 shipped in the US. Venmo or PPFF.
